website_summaries.verdict: The AMD Radeon R7 250X is an entry-level graphics card that can play 3D games at 1080p resolution and medium-quality settings. Its one drawback? It needs a lot of power.
cons: Same specs as the two-year-old AMD Radeon HD 7770

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year. :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved this card when I got it. It played all of the games I wanted it to, like skyrim in 1080p at ultra settings staying at 60 fps pretty consistently. I was happy with its performance. But I quickly realized how fast it's life was ending. In July of 2015 I build my pc, then in January of 2016 I started getting bsod left and right and before I realized it in June of 2016 my gpu breathed its last breath. So the point of this is to tell people save up more and buy a more worth while gpu or you might have the same fate.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: i love this card i was looking for a good card ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this card i was looking for a good card that i could afford. i found this one and have loved it since. overclocking is a dream on the card, i got it to 1090MHz for my core clock with no problem. i recommend that you don't go over 1110 i experienced a bad crash and driver fail
customer_reviews.author: corrine bridges

customer_reviews.title: This graphics card is quite nice, runs quiet and helped my computer tremendously
customer_reviews.text: This graphics card is quite nice, runs quiet and helped my computer tremendously. I was having issues with my graphics card running hot and then just shutting down the computer entirely. Haven't had a problem since I installed this one. Do pay attention to the specs as this card is quite tall; it took some maneuvering to get it to fit into the space I had inside my tower.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Card, Can Get R7 260 for the Same Price.
customer_reviews.text: So far a great Graphics card, I used it for a build for my sister's boyfriend. Although, it wasn't until after I bought it and installed it did I realize that I can get the R7 260 for the same price. (although I would personally recommend the 260x for a mere $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to 4K
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to power my 27" 4K Dell display. It gets the job done, and was more affordable than any of the other GPU's that offered UHD resolution. If you are just entering the world of UHD, this is a great place to start!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: solid basic card
customer_reviews.text: Its a basic graphics card and dose what I needed it to do. I use it to play elite dangerous your not going to b running GTA with it any time soon but that fine.
customer_reviews.author: SakeCat

customer_reviews.title: second one worked great
customer_reviews.text: first one looked a little suspicions because the box want sealed. second one worked great
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and plays Hawken on my i3 processor at ultra settings.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. For the price can't find a better one
customer_reviews.author: John MacGowan

customer_reviews.title: Great mid level card
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics card. Mid level entry. Does have a six pin atx even though the mothboard should be able to power it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Adams

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and really gives super graphics to my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's everything promised and more. Works like a charm and really gives super graphics to my computer. Thanks for the prompt delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This graphics card is amazing! I run nearly everything on ultra!

customer_reviews.title: Great little card.
customer_reviews.text: Great little card, brought life to the kids old computer. Worth the 79.99 that I paid for it. Will update if anything goes wrong. Thought I didn't receive an AMD never settle bronze code, not sure if Amazon is a participating seller.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Msi R7-250
customer_reviews.text: Brought in July of 2014. Work great till it stopped working on March 4 2016.
